name: Custom Mosaic House Number 5 Digit
description:
Take numbering designed by my husband the stained glass artist, and combine with my mosaic background and come away with a custom address plaque for your home! We will work with you to determine the most fabulous colors for your sign. We will contact you shortly after you place your order. 

This 5 number sign is on slate, and measures 16x8" with two holes for hanging(masonry or wood screws work, or you can request one without holes for a wrought iron stand). The digits measure approximately 4" high. 

Grout is sealed for water resistance, but sheltered locations are best.

Makes a wonderful housewarming gift!

Please allow 6-8 weeks for delivery.

Ships USPS Priority Mail with delivery confirmation and International First Class to all other destinations.

name: Custom Mosaic House Number 4 Digit
description:
Take numbering designed by my husband the stained glass artist, and combine with my mosaic background and come away with a custom address plaque for your home! We will work with you to determine the most fabulous colors for your sign. We will contact you shortly after you place your order. 

The letters are about 3" tall in order to fit on a 12x8" pieces of slate(the same size base as our 3 digit sign). 

The sign is on slate, with two holes for hanging(masonry or wood screws work well, or request without holes in order to mount on a stand or in a frame.)  Grout is sealed for water resistance, but sheltered locations are best.

Makes a wonderful housewarming gift!

Please allow 4-6 weeks for delivery.

Ships USPS Priority Mail with delivery confirmation and International First Class to all other destinations.
